text: Kɨ kamaghɨn damuamin bizimɨn mɨngarim, a kamakɨn, gumazamizir kaba akɨrim ragha na gasaragha, aseba bagha ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuibagh ami. Gumazamizir kaba, ko men ovaviba, ko Judan atriviba, me fomɨra aser kabagh fozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, me aser kabar ziaba fe, egha arazir kamɨn me danganir kam gamima a nan damazimɨn bar mɨze. Me uaghan pura gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amir puvatɨzir avɨribav soghezɨ, me ariaghirezɨ men ghuziba danganir kam gire.
